verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Till the whole world knows,
Till the whole world knows,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
I will shout and sing
of Christ my King,
Till the whole world knows.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
I’ll tell to all that God is love;
For the world has never known

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
The great compassion
of His heart
For the wayward and the lone

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: I’ll tell of mercy’s boundless tide,

verse.name: v2b
v3a
verse.lines:
I’ll tell of grace
that keeps the soul,
Of abiding peace within,

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
Of faith that overcomes
the world,
With its tumult and its din.

verse.name: v4a
verse.lines:
Eternal glory is the goal
That awaits the sons of light;

verse.name: v4b
verse.lines:
Eternal darkness, black as death,
For the children of the night
